name: Vampire Hunter Vee
description:
Vampire Hunter Vee is a passion project of mine. I have loved 2D games since I was a kid in the 80s playing Atari. To this day one of my favorite games is Shinobi III. I also love the older Castlevania's before they became metroid-like, such a Symphony of the Night. I like that game, but I prefer Castlevania, and III and IV, and my favorite is probably Bloodlines. 

However, Vampire Hunter Vee is not just a Castlevania clone. It will be different enough to stand on its own. 

I built this page in hopes that you will try out the demos, which I will be updating on this page. This gives you a chance to try different mechanics that I am working on and give your feedback. 

Anything you want to share that might help the game be the best it can be is most welcomed. Thank you for taking a look.
